body_html: Hey @beanieboi – sorry for the long wait and again, thanks for your PR. I've just push 1ec0cac which solves the problem behind this PR by fixing the offending migrations. I'm closing this PR in favor of that commit since it's less "invasive". I hope you're ok with this.
body_text: Hey @beanieboi – sorry for the long wait and again, thanks for your PR. I've just push 1ec0cac which solves the problem behind this PR by fixing the offending migrations. I'm closing this PR in favor of that commit since it's less "invasive". I hope you're ok with this.
body: Hey @beanieboi – sorry for the long wait and again, thanks for your PR. I've just push 1ec0cacd6d26f4e0fd07a68be03d69251c41b7ec which solves the problem behind this PR by fixing the offending migrations. I'm closing this PR in favor of that commit since it's less "invasive". I hope you're ok with this.
